system.description: When you give an NPC an order based on authority they recognize, roll + Savior.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: They do as they please and you take -1 forward against them.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value:
They choose one.

  • do what you say
  • get out of your way
  • attack you at a disadvantage
  • freeze

success.label: Success!
success.value:
They choose one. You also take +1 forward against them.

  • do what you say
  • get out of your way
  • attack you at a disadvantage
  • freeze

system.choices:
• Do what you say
  • Get out of your way
  • Attack you at a disadvantage
  • Freeze
